metadata.creator: Nippon Columbia
metadata.description: Scans of the cover, poster, and labels of the Atsumare Dōbutsu no Mori (Animal Crossing: New Horizons): Totakeke Music Instrumental Selection vinyl record. Scans done by AlexBot2004 with an Epson V600 at 1200 DPI; scans for the front cover, back cover, slip cover, and poster were composited together from multiple scans using Microsoft ICE.
metadata.subject: Animal Crossing
metadata.title: Atsumare Dōbutsu no Mori: Totakeke Music Instrumental Selection scans
